name: Smash Pixel Racing (itch)
description:
Smash Pixel Racing is a 1-4 player local multiplayer game about spaceship racing and smashing your friends into asteroids. Compete against your friends in intense spaceship combat, racing and survival.

Split second decisions and lightning reflexes will ensure your survival on the race to the finish line. No respawning, it's last man standing in space, survival of the fittest. If you make it to the finish line, you've earned it. Drift and dodge around space junk, collect energy, and pick your moment to boost, shoot or smash your way to victory!

Throughout Early Access we will be refining the game, adding lots of awesome content, new features & mechanics, many new ships to race, different environments and obstacles, new gamemodes and more so stay tuned!

Requires 2-4 gamepads! (Windows Xbox gamepads recommended!)

Local Multipayer Only!

Update 0.13 is out!

Along with the two previous updates, there are unique ship stats like armor, energy capacity and handling, we've got space mines to dodge, several slick new ships, improved combat, and a ton of small tweaks and balance changes!

It is the best time yet to jump in with 2-4 players and get racing!
